titles: A reply to Dr. Mortons generall Defence of three nocent [sic] ceremonies viz. the surplice, crosse in baptisme, and kneeling at the receiving of the sacramentall elements of bread and wine.
author: Ames, William, 1576-1633.
Calderwood, David, 1575-1650, attributed name.
notes: A reply to: Morton, Thomas.  A defence of the innocencie of the three ceremonies of the Church of England.
Printer's name and address from STC.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
